newsitem.title: USA: U.S. House tax panel changes time for tax bill.
newsitem.headline: U.S. House tax panel changes time for tax bill.

text.p: The House Ways and Means Committee changed the time for consideration of tax legislation Wednesday to 1500 EDT/1900 GMT.
It was previously scheduled for 1100 EDT/1500 GMT and no reason was given for the time change.
The committee will take up legislation proposed by its chairman, Rep. Bill Archer, a Texas Republican, and any amendments offered.
The package of $85 billion net tax cuts over five years aims to fill in the details of the budget pact reached between congressional leaders and the White House last month.
